ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Davis,Wally Wood,Will Elder,Bill Elder,Wally Wood,Jack Davis
ComicInfo.Summary:
Katchandhammer Kids!: A parody of the Katzenjammer Kids comic strip.
Sound Effects!: A murder mystery with no dialog, only sound effects.
Paul Revere's Ride!: A humorous illustration of the poem by Longfellow.
Cowboy!: Parallel stories comparing the movie version of the Old West with real life.
ComicInfo.Tags: Mama Katzenjammer,Dur Inspector,Dur Captain,Paul Revere,Hans Katzenjammer,Fritz Katzenjammer
ComicInfo.Title: Katchandhammer Kids!; Sound Effects!; Paul Revere's Ride!; Cowboy!
